an10.174:1: "Bhikkhus, the destruction of life, I say, is threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:2: Taking what is not given, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:3: Sexual misconduct, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:4: False speech, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:5: Divisive speech, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:6: Harsh speech, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:7: Idle chatter, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:8: Longing,I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:9: Ill will, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
an10.174:10: Wrong view, I say, is also threefold: caused by greed, caused by hatred, and caused by delusion.
